alternativeNames: Dilxot, ; Dilixat, ; Kasm, Dilxat; Dilixiat, ; Dilxat,
comments: Dilxat, Dilxot, Dilixiat and Dilixat are all from Fl. Xinjiangensis but Dilxat is his forename.
examples: Ajania qiraica C.H.An & Kasim in  Fl. Xinjiangensis 5: 476 (1999).
source: Publ. cited here, Index Herb. on-line. Ihsan A. Al-Shehbaz
